structuredJobpost.summary: Safe is looking for a Senior Data Engineer to drive the enhancement of data pipelines and data warehouse. They improve automation and unlock insights.
structuredJobpost.title: Senior Data Engineer
structuredJobpost.description: As a Senior Data Engineer, you will contribute to a pioneering project at the heart of web3 innovation. You will drive the enhancement of our data pipelines and data warehouse, build data orchestrations to improve the automation of our key pipelines, and unlock deeper insights and more impactful analyses across multiple teams. Continuously improve and maintain data integrations, develop new data pipelines, partner with Dune for scalable spells, use advanced SQL techniques, expand our data warehouse, write scripts for analytics data, set up data orchestrations, integrate marketing data, and play an active role in defining and executing our data strategy.
responsibilities: Continuously improve and maintain data integrations
Develop new data pipelines
Partner with Dune for scalable spells
Use advanced SQL techniques
Expand data warehouse
Write scripts for analytics data
Set up data orchestrations
Integrate marketing data
Define and execute data strategy

properties.summary: Safe provides secure and modular smart accounts for managing digital assets.
properties.name: Safe
properties.description: Safe offers smart accounts that are secure, modular, and widely used for managing digital assets. The platform supports multi-sig wallets and provides a comprehensive account abstraction stack for developers.

structuredJobpost.summary: Yellow Card is looking for a Commercial Finance Analyst to implement reports and dashboards, produce financial metrics, and support financial control. They drive financial success through sound analysis.
requirements: 3+ years combined experience in Financial Accounting, Management Accounting, or Commercial Finance
Previous experience in Group or Regional level Commercial Finance teams
Excellent Excel and financial modelling skills
Excellent English communication and presentation skills
Ability to summarize complex concepts clearly
Ability to grasp, navigate and solve complex business problems
High ownership and ability to work independently
Agile and able to work in a rapidly evolving environment
structuredJobpost.title: Commercial Finance Analyst
structuredJobpost.description: You will implement and produce reports and dashboards, including weekly and monthly finance reporting dashboards, monthly management packs, and segmented P&Ls. You will produce financial metrics and reports for quarterly board decks, manage budgeting and reforecasting, and support the VP Finance in scrutinizing the cost base. You will ensure financial control for AP spend, assess new business cases for financial viability, and finalize the setup of a central repository for vendor contracts. You will also gather information using research tools, produce accurate deliverables, and maintain templates and procedures.
responsibilities: Implement and produce reports and dashboards
Produce financial metrics and reports for quarterly board decks
Manage budgeting and reforecasting
Support VP Finance in scrutinizing cost base
Ensure financial control for AP spend
Assess new business cases for financial viability
Finalize setup of central repository for vendor contracts
Gather information using research tools
Produce accurate deliverables
Maintain templates and procedures

properties.summary: Yellow Card is the largest and only licensed Stablecoin on/off ramp on the African continent.
properties.name: Yellow Card Financial
properties.description: Operating across 20 countries, we provide individuals and businesses of all sizes across Africa with secure, liquid, and cost-effective access to USDT, USDC, and PYUSD via their local currency directly and through our Payments API.

structuredJobpost.summary: Cryptopay is looking for a Business Analyst to dive into the B2B crypto market and collaborate with product managers. Responsibilities include articulating requirements and validating features.
requirements: 3-5 years of experience as a Systems/Business analyst
Basic understanding of the tech landscape
Ability to create terms of reference
structuredJobpost.title: Business Analyst
structuredJobpost.description: You will dive into the B2B crypto market, collaborate with product managers to gather and document requirements, and articulate these to the development team. You'll create technical assignments, validate implemented features, and propose improvements based on feedback.
responsibilities: Dive into the B2B crypto market
Collaborate with product managers
Articulate and describe requirements
Create technical assignments
Validate implemented features
Analyze outcomes and propose improvements

properties.summary: Cryptopay is a simple and secure way to buy, sell, and spend cryptocurrency.
properties.name: Cryptopay Limited
properties.description: Cryptopay is a cryptocurrency exchange and wallet that allows users to buy, sell, and spend cryptocurrency. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Estonia. Cryptopay offers a variety of features, including a mobile app, a debit card, and a merchant payment processing service. The company also has a strong focus on security, and it uses a variety of measures to protect its users' funds.

structuredJobpost.summary: Couger is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to develop and operate backend systems for their human AI platform. They collaborate with engineering managers to enhance team productivity.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with Python and TypeScript
Experience creating and using design documents
Experience sharing and reviewing design documents
structuredJobpost.title: Senior Backend Engineer
structuredJobpost.description: You will develop and operate backend systems for the human AI platform LUDENS, including web APIs and data processing pipelines. Collaborate with engineering managers and stakeholders to lead technical projects. Provide technical leadership and mentorship to improve team skills and productivity.
responsibilities: Develop and operate backend systems for LUDENS
Provide technical leadership and mentorship
Collaborate with engineering managers and stakeholders
Solve complex technical challenges

properties.summary: Couger Inc. is a company that develops autonomous technology products, including virtual human agents.
properties.name: Couger, Inc.
properties.description: Couger Inc. is a company that develops autonomous technology products, including virtual human agents. The company's products are designed to help people interact with technology in a more natural and intuitive way.

structuredJobpost.summary: GAMEE is looking for a Web3 Marketing Lead to oversee marketing efforts and innovate in Web3 ecosystems. They lead a team and create a growth-focused environment.
requirements: Previous experience with marketing digital products
structuredJobpost.title: Web3 Marketing Lead
structuredJobpost.description: You will lead a team of 7 professionals, focusing on team delivery, product marketing, high-level strategy, and creating a growth-focused environment. Lead and innovate the marketing strategy for digital products and all marketing channels. Manage and lead the Marketing Team. Evaluate, adapt, and iterate marketing campaigns based on data impact. Collaborate with other team leads and C-level on a daily basis. Work on high-level partnerships with global brands from web2 and web3.
responsibilities: Lead and innovate the marketing strategy for digital products and all marketing channels
Manage and lead the Marketing Team
Evaluate, adapt, and iterate marketing campaigns based on data impact
Collaborate with other team leads and C-level on a daily basis
Work on high-level partnerships with global brands from web2 and web3
benefits: Flexibility (partial or full home office possible)
Possibility to travel to events all around the world
Office in a villa at Náplavka with a garden
Ability to work from anywhere in Europe within +/-1h from CET timezone

properties.summary: GAMEE is a platform connecting gamers, brands, and Web3 projects through play.
properties.name: GAMEE
properties.description: GAMEE is a platform that aims to onboard gamers to Web3 through mobile gaming, offering access to exclusive leagues and gated experiences. It harnesses interoperability with Web3 partners and allows users to earn and customize their first NFT, turning gaming skills into crypto rewards.

structuredJobpost.summary: GAMEE is looking for a Marketing Designer to shape brand identity and elevate marketing efforts. Focus on mobile entertainment platforms and Web3 partnerships.
requirements: Understanding of blockchain, crypto, and NFT communities
structuredJobpost.title: Marketing Designer
structuredJobpost.description: You will create marketing materials, improve brand visual identity, and collaborate with teams to optimize store assets. Embrace creativity and innovation in a fast-paced environment.
responsibilities: Create marketing materials
Improve visual identity
Generate ideas for marketing visuals
Collaborate with performance marketing team
Work closely with Marketing, Product, and Games teams

properties.summary: GAMEE is a platform connecting gamers, brands, and Web3 projects through play.

properties.description: GAMEE is a platform that aims to onboard gamers to Web3 through mobile gaming, offering access to exclusive leagues and gated experiences. It harnesses interoperability with Web3 partners and allows users to earn and customize their first NFT, turning gaming skills into crypto rewards.

structuredJobpost.summary: Paxos is looking for a Head of Growth to define and execute the company’s growth strategy on a global scale. They oversee revenue expansion, market penetration, and strategic partnerships.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Computer Science, or related field
Proven track record of success in driving partnerships and business development initiatives
Strong network of contacts and relationships with key stakeholders in the financial services industry
Strategic thinker with the ability to identify growth opportunities
Deep understanding of blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, and financial markets
Willingness to travel globally as needed
structuredJobpost.title: Head of Growth
structuredJobpost.description: As the Head of Growth, you will define and execute Paxos’ growth strategy globally. You will oversee a large organization, expand market presence, develop new revenue streams, and drive strategic partnerships. You will lead cross-functional initiatives and navigate complex environments.
responsibilities: Own and drive Paxos’ comprehensive growth strategy
Lead a large, multi-tiered organization
Collaborate closely with the executive leadership team
Spearhead the identification and prioritization of large-scale strategic opportunities
Establish and maintain relationships with C-level executives
Foster a culture of innovation, accountability, and operational excellence
Direct cross-functional collaboration with product, engineering, marketing, and legal teams
Lead the negotiation and execution of complex, high-value partnership agreements
Oversee and optimize a robust pipeline of growth initiatives
Represent Paxos as a thought leader in the industry
Stay ahead of market trends, competitive pressures, and regulatory changes
Build and mentor a world-class partnerships and business development team

properties.summary: Paxos provides blockchain infrastructure for enterprises, offering regulated financial solutions and digital asset services.
properties.name: Paxos
properties.description: Paxos is a regulated blockchain infrastructure provider that offers a suite of products and services for enterprises in the financial sector. Their offerings include crypto brokerage, stablecoin and payment solutions, securities settlement, and commodities settlement. Paxos aims to harness blockchain technology to build infrastructure that enables enterprises to launch innovative products for the financial markets of tomorrow.

structuredJobpost.summary: EtherMail is looking for a Customer Support Agent to assist users with account-related issues in the Web3 space. Provide clear responses, verify account details, and escalate technical problems.
requirements: Ability to work efficiently and manage time
structuredJobpost.title: Customer Support Agent
structuredJobpost.description: You will provide clear, helpful responses to user inquiries via email in English. Review and verify users' account details to resolve issues. Use pre-written templates for common questions to streamline support. Escalate technical problems to the IT team when necessary. Update records, such as user details or issue logs, in Excel as required.
responsibilities: Provide clear, helpful responses to user inquiries via email
Review and verify users' account details
Use pre-written templates for common questions
Escalate technical problems to the IT team
Update records in Excel

properties.summary: EtherMail is reimagining email for Web3 with anonymous and encrypted wallet-to-wallet communication.
properties.name: EtherMail
properties.description: EtherMail is the first email solution setting the standard for anonymous and encrypted wallet-to-wallet communication. It allows fully anonymous and encrypted P2P communication and rewards its users for reading relevant content in their inbox. EtherMail addresses the inadequacies of traditional email for Web3 customers, offering solutions to phishing attacks, spamming, privacy concerns, and the lack of decentralized email standards.

structuredJobpost.summary: Chaos Labs is looking for a PR Manager to develop PR strategies and manage media relations. They increase brand visibility and maintain strong media relations.
requirements: 3-5 years of experience in public relations
Proven experience in executing successful PR campaigns
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
Familiarity with cryptocurrency and blockchain technology
structuredJobpost.title: PR Manager
structuredJobpost.description: You will develop and implement PR strategies, build relationships with journalists, manage media outreach, create PR materials, coordinate interviews, monitor media coverage, and manage crisis communication.
responsibilities: Develop and implement PR strategies
Build and maintain relationships with journalists
Manage and execute media outreach efforts
Create and distribute press releases
Coordinate media interviews and public appearances
Monitor media coverage and report on PR performance
Work closely with internal teams to align PR efforts
Manage crisis communication
benefits: Opportunity to work in a rapidly evolving industry
Chance to make a significant impact

properties.summary: Our platform transforms on-chain risk management, security, and incentive strategies. We automate real-time protocol parameter recommendations through advanced Risk Oracles, sophisticated data analytics, modeling, and simulations.
properties.name: Chaos Labs
properties.description: At Chaos Labs, we're reimagining the future of DeFi with automated, on-chain economic security systems. Our mission is simple: optimize risk management and capital efficiency for DeFi protocols while safeguarding user funds.
